channel.title: research on Michael Pilosov: The Archives
channel.description: Recent content in research on Michael Pilosov: The Archives

item.title: DCI
item.description: The novel framework for solving inverse problems in which all of my doctoral work has been grounded. Talk about the method in broad terms. What makes it different? Please pardon our mess. This page is still a work in progress. I have many projects that I am documenting simultaneously and am doing my best to be thorough and embed a lot of rich metadata so that you can click around based on what you find interesting.
